author: Aquarium Crunch
title: Maldives-Inspired Aquarium Design Tips: How To Choose Best Fish & LED Lights
text: Maldives-Inspired Aquarium Design Tips: How To Choose Best Fish & LED Lights Who needs an aquarium visit when you can bring the experience to your living room? Aquarium Crunch has got you covered with their guide to creating a Maldives-inspired aquarium. (firmenpresse) - Who says you need to be a pro to create a sick aquarium? Check out this guide and you'll be able to recreate a tropical paradise in no time. Aquarium Crunch's guide titled “Maldives-Inspired Custom Aquarium: Home Reef Habitat” covers everything from selecting the right tank and choosing the appropriate inhabitants to creating a reef structure and maintaining water quality. Go to https://aquariumcrunch.com/maldives-inspired-custom-aquarium-home-reef-habitat/ for more details! It also covers how lighting, filtration, and monitoring systems can help you simulate the natural habitat of aquatic organisms, leading to a healthier ecosystem. Creating A Thriving Oasis for Tropical Marine LifeAquarium Crunch recommends designing an aquarium that mimics the natural habitat of tropical marine life, with a focus on substrate, decor, and other design elements that promote diversity and health. A key aspect is selecting the right inhabitants for the aquarium. The guide emphasizes the importance of choosing fish and invertebrates that not only coexist peacefully but also contribute to the ecological health of the mini-reef. You can consider small, peaceful fish, like gobies and blennies. Choosing LED Lighting Systems For Your AquariumInstalling an LED lighting system is another important aspect of creating a Maldives-inspired aquarium. You can use LED lights that mimic the colors and intensity of the sun and moon to simulate the natural light spectrum. The LED lighting systems can also be programmed to change color and intensity to match the natural living conditions. Aquarium Crunch also notes that aquarists should establish a weekly and monthly cleaning and maintenance schedule. One-Stop Shop For Aquarium ResourcesAquarium Crunch offers other resources on its website that focus on aspects like tank budgeting, achieving perfect pH levels, and others. Using these resources, beginners and seasoned aquarists can create and maintain a thriving home aquarium. “Remember, the key to a successful aquarium lies in careful planning, ongoing education, and a commitment to sustainability,” said a spokesperson. "With patience and dedication, you’ll witness the growth and evolution of your underwater world, gaining not just a hobby but an immersive experience that connects you to the natural wonders of our oceans." With Aquarium Crunch, you'll be well on your way to creating an aquarium that'll make your living room look like a tropical paradise. Visit https://aquariumcrunch.com/maldives-inspired-custom-aquarium-home-reef-habitat/ to learn more. Themen in dieser Pressemitteilung: Unternehmensinformation / Kurzprofil: Aquarium Crunch Aquarium Crunch https://aquariumcrunch.com aquariumcrunch(at)gmail.com +1 832 603 9988 306 Fox Trail Winchester Datum: 29.12.2023 - 03:00 Uhr Sprache: Deutsch News-ID 697512 Anzahl Zeichen: 2834 contact information: Contact person: Kim Clark Town: [Winchester](https://www.firmenpresse.de/presseportal/winchester.html) Phone: +1 832 603 9988 Kategorie: Typ of Press Release: Unternehmensinformation type of sending: Veröffentlichung Date of sending: 29/12/2023 Diese Pressemitteilung wurde bisher 40 mal aufgerufen. Die Pressemitteilung mit dem Titel: "Maldives-Inspired Aquarium Design Tips: How To Choose Best Fish & LED Lights" steht unter der journalistisch-redaktionellen Verantwortung von Aquarium Crunch ( [Nachricht senden](https://www.firmenpresse.de/kontakt697512.html)) Beachten Sie bitte die weiteren Informationen zum [Haftungsauschluß](https://www.firmenpresse.de/haftungsausschluss.php)(gemäß [TMG - TeleMedianGesetz](https://dejure.org/gesetze/TMG/10.html)) und dem [Datenschutz](https://www.firmenpresse.de/datenschutz.php)(gemäß der [DSGVO](https://dsgvo-gesetz.de/)).

author: @iltempo_official
title: Il regime iraniano provoca l'Occidente: nuove centrifughe per arricchire l'uranio
text:
Iran, l'affronto a tutto il mondo: nuove centrifughe per arricchire l'uranio
L’Iran lancerà una serie di nuove e avanzate centrifughe per arricchire l’uranio, in risposta alla risoluzione dell’Agenzia internazionale per l’energia atomica che ha censurato Teheran per scarsa cooperazione. «Il capo dell’Organizzazione per l’energia atomica dell’Iran ha disposto di prendere misure efficaci», fanno sapere in una nota congiunta l’Organizzazione e il ministero degli Esteri, «fra cui il lancio di una significativa serie di nuove e avanzate centrifughe di vario tipo». Ma giusto due giorni fa, il direttore generale dell’Aiea, Rafael Grossi, aveva accolto con favore il «passo concreto» adottato dall’Iran nel limitare le sue scorte di uranio arricchito. «Penso che questo sia un passo concreto nella giusta direzione. Abbiamo un fatto che è stato verificato da noi stessi», aveva detto Grossi ai giornalisti a Vienna. «Attribuisco importanza al fatto che per la prima volta da quando l’Iran ha preso le distanze dai suoi obblighi passati, stia prendendo una direzione diversa», le parole di Grossi. Che stridono completamente con l’annuncio odierno degli uomini di Khamenei, che non fanno passi indietro sul progamma per il nucleare.
Elly e Bonelli in viaggio premio da Khamenei

author: sofia lachapelle
title: Florida se prepara para un vórtice polar: temperaturas extremas podrían llegar hasta el sur del estado | Univision Orlando WVEN | Univision
text:
ORLANDO, Florida.- El Estado del Sol está en alerta ante la inminente llegada de un vórtice polar que podría traer temperaturas heladas hasta el sur de su territorio, incluyendo Miami . Este evento climático, inusual para la región, podría alterar la vida diaria de los residentes acostumbrados a climas cálidos.
Este invierno ha estado marcado por contrastes climáticos. A pesar de un diciembre excepcionalmente cálido en el norte de los Estados Unidos y una cobertura de nieve en niveles históricamente bajos, la llegada de frentes fríos y un vórtice polar podría cambiar radicalmente las condiciones. En Florida, este fenómeno podría empujar el aire ártico más al sur de lo habitual , trayendo temperaturas atípicas y heladas.
Relacionados Frente ártico trae temperaturas inusualmente bajas a Florida: ¿dónde hará más frío? Comparte
El Servicio Meteorológico Nacional pronostica dos frentes fríos que impactarán al estado durante los primeros días de enero. El primer frente se espera entre el 3 y 4 de enero, seguido de un segundo el 8 de enero, ambos acompañados de aire ártico.
Norte de Florida: Las temperaturas caerán por debajo del punto de congelación después del 8 de enero. Centro de Florida: Se esperan temperaturas en los bajos 40°F (4-9°C). Sur de Florida, incluyendo Miami: Las temperaturas oscilarán entre los 40s y 50s°F (4-15°C), con un posible descenso adicional. La llegada del vórtice polar está proyectada para el 11 o 12 de enero , y podría llevar temperaturas cercanas al punto de congelación incluso en Miami, aunque los meteorólogos consideran poco probable que se alcance ese nivel en la ciudad.
Más sobre Frente Frío
UNIVISION ORLANDO Frente ártico trae temperaturas inusualmente bajas a Florida: ¿dónde hará más frío? 2 min de lectura
UNIVISION ORLANDO Parques acuáticos de Disney cerrados por las bajas temperaturas en Orlando 0:22
UNIVISION ORLANDO Alerta por tiempo severo en Florida Central: Tormentas fuertes tras llegada de un frente frío 2:01
UNIVISION ORLANDO Abren refugios del centro de Florida por la llegada de un frente frío 2:35 Relacionados Alista el abrigo: se prevén fuertes nevadas debido a tormenta invernal que afectará Nueva York Comparte Meteorólogos recomiendan tomar precauciones ante llegada de frentes fríos y vórtice polar Jennifer Chang, meteoróloga de Univisión Orlando , explicó que el impacto del vórtice polar será significativo, pero que las condiciones secas podrían mitigar algunos efectos en los primeros días del fenómeno . “Durante los últimos cuatro días habrá aire seco sin probabilidad de lluvias, con temperaturas mínimas de 47 grados en el centro de Florida,” mencionó Chang.
Además, destacó que “ el sábado se sentirá muy frío y algo ventoso , y aunque las condiciones se mantendrán secas, un nuevo frente frío traerá probabilidad de lluvias el viernes.”
Las autoridades han emitido una serie de alertas, incluyendo:
Aviso de congelación y advertencia de heladas: Especialmente para el noreste de Florida y la costa sureste de Georgia. Las temperaturas podrían caer entre 30° y 33°F (-1°C a 0°C). Riesgo elevado de incendios: Debido a la baja humedad esperada el viernes y sábado. Protección recomendada: Cultivos sensibles, plantas, ganado, mascotas y personas deben resguardarse ante las bajas temperaturas. Este evento se perfila como uno de los más fríos que Florida ha enfrentado en años recientes. Las autoridades y meteorólogos instan a la población a tomar medidas preventivas para protegerse y minimizar el impacto de las bajas temperaturas.
Te podría interesar: Cargando galería Comparte RELACIONADOS: Frente Frío • Alerta de frío • Ola de Frío • Florida •

author: Jeremy Kuzmarov
title: American-Israeli Anthropologist Suggests that “We Are All Being Palestinized” - CovertAction Magazine
text: Israel’s Expertise in Pacifying the Palestinians Is in High Demand by Capitalist Elites As Populations Around the World Grow Restive As the world watches in horror Israel’s military assault on the people of Gaza, people are left to wonder why world leaders are not doing more to censure Israel and are allowing Israel to get away with mass killing. Jeff Halper, an American-Israeli anthropologist who has written numerous books on Israeli history, has a clear answer. He says that leaders of countries around the world are feeling more insecure as wealth is increasingly concentrated in the hands of a tiny capitalist elite and popular disaffection and the threat of rebellion grows. Israel is revered precisely for its mastery of population-control techniques against the Palestinians, which many leaders want to emulate against dissident or minority groups within their own borders. Part of Israel’s ace in the hole, according to Halper, is its development of a formidable weapons industry that allows it to supply high-tech weapons to countries around the world for the purpose of population control. Israel is at the cutting edge in the development of surveillance satellites, weaponized and surveillance drones, Artificial Intelligence (AI) target identification systems, spyware gadgets and crowd control and cyberwarfare technologies, which it sells around the world. Israel additionally provides training to police and military forces and supplies mercenaries who can be found in presidential guards and among the enforcers of drug cartels. Because of their heavy reliance on Israeli military aid, many countries may make a show of criticizing certain Israeli excesses but do nothing to impede them, refusing to impose economic sanctions or embargoes or trying to cut Israel off from world trade. Halper spoke during a [webinar](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yc9k688J1kk) on December 6 sponsored by the War Industries Resistance Network and Massachusetts Peace Action. His presentation included a map which showed the huge number of countries to which Israel sells weapon systems. Among them are countries run by dictators to which even the U.S. refuses to sell weapons, like Equatorial Guinea and [Myanmar](https://www.haaretz.com/israel-news/security-aviation/2023-09-05/ty-article/.premium/israel-sold-arms-to-myanmar-even-after-the-2021-military-coup/ 18a-6000-d339-a3af-f5b673e90000). Israel is also China’s number two arms supplier and the top supplier to India, which purchases more than $1 billion per year. Additionally, Israel is a supplier of arms to South Korea, Brazil, Russia, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Uganda, Turkey and Azerbaijan which used the arms to brutalize Armenians in Nagorno Karabakh. Halper sees Israel as a key global enforcer of the world capitalist system whose arm sales extend to 191 countries (up from 130 eight years ago). The Occupied Territories have functioned as a laboratory for testing new weapons and counterinsurgency techniques by Israel which collaborates closely with the U.S. military and allows for testing of its new weapon systems. U.S. leaders are in love with Israel because they seek to emulate Israel’s success against the Palestinians in asymmetrical warfare, which they have failed at miserably in countries like Afghanistan, Iraq, Syria and before that Vietnam. U.S. leaders also see as a model for the U.S.-Mexico border the censor-laden wall that Israel built surrounding Gaza. Halper warned that we are in danger of “all being Palestinized.” All of this is by a global capitalist elite and its political representatives who are adopting ever more repressive measures in an attempt to sustain their wealth and power. Funding Your Own Assassins Israel’s claim to be fighting in Gaza in self-defense is undercut by the emergence of new details about its role in funding and propping up Hamas. On December 10, The New York Times published an [article](https://www.nytimes.com/2023/12/10/world/middleeast/israel-qatar-money-prop-up-hamas.html) entitled “‘Buying Quiet’: Inside the Israeli Plan That Propped Up Hamas” by Mark Mazetti and Ronen Bergman. The article noted that, “for years, the Qatari government had been sending millions of dollars a month into the Gaza Strip—money that helped prop up the Hamas government there. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel not only tolerated those payments, he had encouraged them.” So too did three American presidents—Barack Obama, Donald J. Trump and Joe Biden. According to the Times, much of the money was dispensed to Hamas from suitcases by Qatari officials who were escorted into Gaza by the Mossad. The money allowed Hamas to divert some of its own budget toward military operations targeting Israel, including the October 7 attacks. CovertAction Magazine has [previously detailed](https://covertactionmagazine.com/2023/11/27/israels-government-attacks-ordinary-jews-as-well-as-palestinians/) how the Israeli billionaire class, whom Benjamin Netanyahu represents, has sought a state of permanent war as part of their governing strategy. The billionaires grow rich from war and the Israeli war industry, and the creation of a terrorist threat legitimizes expanded military operations designed to wipe out the Palestinians and enhance the goal of establishing a “Greater Israel.” Israel had been gripped with massive protests on the eve of the Israel-Gaza War against rising inequality and the attempt to subordinate Israel’s judiciary to the executive branch, with Netanyahu personally facing corruption charges. Once the war broke out, the protests dissipated and Netanyahu could play his familiar role of uniting Israelis of all class backgrounds against a foreign enemy—which conveniently he and his ruling circle had helped to empower. The October 31 issue of The New York Times had an [article](https://www.nytimes.com/2023/10/29/world/europe/israel-reservists-hamas-war.html) tellingly titled “They Refused to Serve. Now They’re Supporting Israel’s War Effort.” It profiled former coordinators of the anti-Netanyahu street protests who had once vowed not to serve in the IDF, but who were now supporting Israel’s war effort in reaction to the Tribe of Nova massacre and helping to organize clothing and military equipment drives for soldiers on the front lines of the war in Gaza. No wonder then that Netanyahu’s government ignored warnings of the impending Hamas attack! A Times article on December 20 was titled “After the Oct. 7 Attacks, Israelis Are Becoming More Politically Conservative.” It emphasized that a) Israel’s peace camp had been driven virtually underground after the October 7 attacks; b) that being a leftist had now become a dirty word; and that c) Israelis had moved decidedly to the right on a number of issues, including support for settlers in the West Bank, endorsement of far-right politicians, and even the reestablishment of a military occupation of Gaza. Tai Schneider, a columnist for the Times of Israel was quoted as saying “the trauma of what happened on Oct. 7 shifted Israeli society. It made them question the most basic tenets of whether they were safe in their homes. They are calling now for more—more military, more protection–more hard-line policies.” [[1]](#post-64002-footnote-0) This is similar in many ways to what happened in the United States vis-à-vis 9/11. The Times in its December 10 article emphasized as a motive for Netanyahu’s funding of Hamas his goal of wanting to establish a counterweight to the Palestinian Authority in the West Bank. In 2012, Netanyahu told Israeli journalist Dan Margalit that having two strong rivals, including Hamas which does not recognize Israel’s legitimacy, would lessen pressure on him to negotiate toward a Palestinian state. Shlomo Brom, a retired general and former deputy to Israel’s national security adviser, said that “one effective way to prevent a two-state solution is to [create a] divide between the Gaza Strip and the West Bank.” The division gives Mr. Netanyahu an excuse to disengage from peace talks, noting that he can say, “I have no partner.” [[2]](#post-64002-footnote-1) This motive is totally perverse and undermines Netanyahu’s claim to have launched military operations to protect Israeli security— from an enemy that he financed, no less. Chaos Agents Netanyahu’s critics include Ami Ayalon, the former head of the Shin Bet, Israel’s domestic intelligence service, who [stated](https://eir.news/2023/12/news/former-israeli-intel-chief-speaks-bluntly-about-the-failure-of-israels-policy/) that Israel was “controlled by “chaos agents” whose goal is to create a “human disaster” in Gaza, because “from the chaos we shall start again.” “This is exactly the theory of the most radical, fundamental Muslim organizations,” of ISIS and al-Qaeda, Ayalon said. He added that it is foolish to go to war without defining a political goal: “The military goal is never the end goal, military is a tool, war is not the objective…. Victory is never measured in military terms. So when we say ‘the day after,’ we are trying to define the concept of victory, and we are not doing it. It’s a huge failure.” Dethrone King Bibi On December 25, Haaretz’ lead editorial was titled “Dethrone King Bibi.” It argued that the conditions exist to resume the huge protests against Netanyahu and his government that shook Israel for months before October 7. At that time, the protests were focused against Bibi’s dictatorial “judicial reform;” now, their focus will be “King Bibi’s” responsibility for creating the conditions that led to October 7 and the current war. Haaretz wrote that “Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is the one who bears the greatest blame for the security, diplomatic and social failures that led to the October 7 massacre and the outbreak of war. The thousands who protested on Saturday night in Tel Aviv, Haifa and Caesarea, calling for him to be deposed, prove that conditions have matured for the protests to be resumed and to expand the ranks of those taking to the streets.” Haaretz went on to note that Netanyahu accepts no responsibility for that disaster of October 7, but blames the IDF, the intelligence services, the Oslo peace accords and “Yitzhak Rabin and those who continued his path,” the Israeli daily writes, and adds: “All of the above is enough without saying a word about the judicial coup he advanced in the service of the extreme Kahanist right, with its appetite for annexation and Jewish supremacy.” Haaretz concluded by stating that “the time has come to demand from the one who wrought disaster on the State of Israel to vacate his throne and allow others the chance to repair what he has destroyed.” - Sherra Frenkel, “After the Oct. 7 Attacks, Israelis Are Becoming More Politically Conservative,” The New York Times, December 20, 2023, A8. [↑](#post-64002-footnote-ref-0) - Bezalel Smotrich, a far-right politician who is now Netanyahu’s finance minister, put the Israeli strategy [bluntly in 2015](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pB16PMEPuiM&t=10s)when he said: “The Palestinian Authority is a burden,” while “Hamas is an asset.” [↑](#post-64002-footnote-ref-1) CovertAction Magazine is made possible by [subscriptions](https://covertactionmagazine.com/subscribe/), [orders](https://covertactionmagazine.com/orders/) and [donations](https://covertactionmagazine.com/campaigns/fall-fundraiser-2023/) from readers like you. Yet, we hold a steadfast commitment to providing compensation for writers, editorial and technical support. Your support helps facilitate this compensation as well as increase the caliber of this work. author: ABMN Staff
title: Quantbot Technologies LP Sells 10,152 Shares of CECO Environmental Corp. (NASDAQ:CECO) - American Banking and Market News
text:
Quantbot Technologies LP lowered its holdings in CECO Environmental Corp. ( NASDAQ:CECO – Free Report ) by 79.5% during the third quarter, according to its most recent disclosure with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The firm owned 2,610 shares of the company’s stock after selling 10,152 shares during the quarter. Quantbot Technologies LP’s holdings in CECO Environmental were worth $42,000 as of its most recent SEC filing.
A number of other hedge funds and other institutional investors have also recently made changes to their positions in the business. Jump Financial LLC grew its position in CECO Environmental by 200.4% during the third quarter. Jump Financial LLC now owns 33,039 shares of the company’s stock valued at $528,000 after buying an additional 22,039 shares during the period. Mesirow Financial Investment Management Inc. increased its position in shares of CECO Environmental by 20.3% during the third quarter. Mesirow Financial Investment Management Inc. now owns 19,714 shares of the company’s stock valued at $315,000 after acquiring an additional 3,328 shares during the last quarter. Trellus Management Company LLC acquired a new stake in shares of CECO Environmental during the third quarter valued at about $779,000. SG Americas Securities LLC acquired a new stake in shares of CECO Environmental during the third quarter valued at about $204,000. Finally, Cox Capital Mgt LLC acquired a new position in shares of CECO Environmental in the third quarter valued at approximately $359,000. Institutional investors and hedge funds own 68.64% of the company’s stock.

author: A.Smith@voiceofeurope.com
title: France expels Tunisian imam Mahjoub Mahjoubi for flag comments deemed radical | Voice of Europe
text: Interior Minister Gérald Darmanin announced the expulsion of Mahjoub Mahjoubi, an imam, for making contentious remarks regarding the French flag. Mahjoubi, who has resided in France for 38 years after migrating from Tunisia, faced swift deportation following a video surfacing online where he allegedly referred to the tricolor flag as “satanic” and having “no value with Allah,” [as reported by BBC.](https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-68378736) Despite denying any intention to disrespect, Mahjoubi’s remarks sparked controversy, leading to his arrest earlier in the week. The subsequent expulsion was facilitated by France’s revamped immigration laws, celebrated by Darmanin for their efficiency in deporting foreign residents. The expulsion order, shared by French media, cited Mahjoubi’s promotion of a regressive and intolerant image of Islam, potentially fueling behavior contrary to republican values. Accusations of encouraging discrimination against women, tensions with the Jewish community, and jihadist radicalization were also levied against him, including derogatory references to Jewish individuals. Darmanin highlighted the swift execution of the expulsion less than 12 hours after Mahjoubi’s arrest, emphasizing the government’s commitment to maintaining firmness and bolstering national security. The immigration reforms, aimed at strengthening France, prioritize the deportation of individuals posing a grave threat to public order or with criminal convictions.

author: Anthony Robledo
title: Viral photo of forlorn Spiral Hot Dogs owner leads to booming business
text: An Oklahoma hot dog joint owner visibly wanted customers one day and he soon got more than he bargained for. During a slow shift on Dec. 20, a customer took a photo of Scott Hosek standing by his restaurant entrance waiting for diners and shared it on social media. Hosek would soon have no time to stand around as " Spirals: Hot Dogs & More ," in Norman, Oklahoma, saw booming business once the post went viral. "We immediately started doing double digits in sales," Hosek told USA TODAY on Thursday. "It happened really fast to me." The day the photo was taken, Hosek found himself staring out the window upset his family business of four years wasn't booming as well as others ahead of Christmas. Hosek said he had no idea why Spirals saw a sudden wave of new customers after Dec. 20 until the person responsible for posting the photo, Nick Chappell, later apologized and offered to take the post down. Hosek wouldn't hear of it. "You just wouldn't expect it. Social media is amazing. It's amazing that people get involved with it," he said. "But more importantly, it's the stuff that you just don't think would work. That's what works." 'I will always love you': See Dolly Parton grant Utah man's dying wish to meet her Chappell visited the Norman area for his job as an Oklahoma Army National Guard. As part of their weekly hot dog Wednesday routine, Chappell and a his co-worker found Spirals on Google Maps and took a chance. Noticing Hosek gazing, Chappell decided to capture the "wholesome moment" on Snapchat captioning "He has been standing here waiting on customers to come in." "A good buddy of mine named Chad said, 'Hey, man, you can either post this on Facebook or I'm going to post this on Facebook. Some way or another we're going to get this guy some customers,'" Chappell said. In a Facebook post, Chappell gave an excellent recommendation of the restaurant, complimenting their food and "off the charts" service. He shared a photo of his dish, the menu and of Hosek waiting for diners. Chappell was blown away by the success of the post, which has since had over 2,000 shares, and even more surprised to see over 70 guests at the diner during his next visit. "I'm not a huge social media guy I typically don't share," Chappell said. "I don't even know really the words to describe it as but it made me even that much happier that I did make a post." Hosek is showing his gratitude by adding a new item in Chappell's honor. Having named hot dogs and bowls after family members, he was more than happy to do so. The "Thunderbird" is a hot link with bacon, cream cheese and jalapeños, Hosek said. The meal gets its name from the Thunderbird Unit Patch for the 45th Infantry, which Chappell is a part of. The two reconnected at the restaurant on Thursday, where they both got emotional talking about the post's impact. Chappell received a certificate of appreciation during the unveiling of the "Thunderbird" and was told he is now forever part of the Spirals family. "To know that it was a humble guy that just saw our need and did what he could. He doesn’t have a real following on social media, he hardly ever shares anything and to know that one post had so much power. It was super cool," Hosek added.

author: Obi Ugochuwku
title: The call from PDP for the arrest and prosecution of the suspended Adamawa REC
text:
Inspector-General of Police Olukayode Egbetokun has been urged by the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, to swiftly work on arresting and prosecuting Hudu Yunusa-Ari, the suspended INEC Resident Electoral Commissioner in Adamawa, according to the national publicity secretary of PDP, Debo Ologunagba. The call was made during a news conference held on Thursday in Abuja. Ologunagba emphasized the importance of adhering to a court order by apprehending and prosecuting Yunusa-Yari.
Yunusa-Ari faced suspension due to his actions of trying to take over the powers of the state returning officer by declaring the governorship candidate of the All Progressives Congress, APC, Aishatu Binani, as the winner of the April 15, 2023 Adamawa governorship election, even though the election results compilation was not complete at that time.
Ologunagba condemned this move as a civilian coup and an assault on Nigeria’s constitutional democracy.
A warrant of arrest against Yunusa-Ari was issued by the High Court of Justice of Adamawa State, No. 9, Yola Division, dated May 21, 2024, directing the IGP to apprehend and present Yunusa-Ari before the court to face the charges against him. The IGP’s office received the court order on May 23.
Despite his removal, Yunusa-Ari has been evading arrest, not recognizing that “time does not run against the state in criminal matters,” as stated by Ologunagba. The delay in prosecuting Yunusa-Ari was highlighted as a significant threat to Nigeria’s democracy and the rule of law.
PDP emphasized the importance of the prompt apprehension and diligent prosecution of Yunusa-Ari to prevent setting a wrong precedent and fostering impunity among public officers. The Inspector-General of Police was urged to act promptly in accordance with the court order to arrest Yunusa-Ari and bring him to face prosecution.
There were concerns that Yunusa-Ari might attempt to flee the country to evade trial, hence the urgency in bringing him to justice, said Ologunagba. PDP stood firm on holding Yunusa-Ari accountable for his actions against democracy.

organizations.name: high court of justice of adamawa state
